Package magnusdroid.com.glucup_2date.Controler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutActivity
    Show info about GlucUp2Date: Developed and funded Call by PersonalActivity and PacientListFragment
    AddGlucActivity
    Activity to add new record of bloodglucose.
    AlarmFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    AlarmReceiver
    Created by Dell on 22/07/2016.
    AlarmService
    Created by Dell on 22/07/2016.
    ChartFragment
    Fragment to show the Graphs for the records.
    DayOfWeekFragment
    Fragment to show Records in a week.
    FilterActivity
    Activity to search record by Date, Week, Value or All of them.
    HelpActivity  
    HelpFragment
    Fragment to show the user manual.
    ListGlucoseActivity
    Activity to show List or Chart according with the Filter selected by FilterActivity Use MDateGlucose, MAllGlucose, MValueGlucose classes to connect with server and get the data
    LoginActivity
    A login screen that offers login via dni/password.
    LogOutFragment
    A fragment representing a dialog to logout session.
    ManualActivity  
    PacientActivity
    This activity is launched when a user is a Pacient.
    PacienteDetailActivity
    An activity representing a single Paciente detail screen.
    PacienteDetailFragment
    A fragment representing a single Paciente detail screen.
    PacienteListActivity
    An activity representing a list of Pacientes.
    PacientListFragment
    A Fragment to list the most recent glucose record.
    RecyclerViewAdapter
    Adapter to setup the RecyclerView.
    RecyclerViewAdapter.RecyclerViewHolder  
    SearchActivity  
    SetAlarmActivity  
    StartActivity
    An full-screen activity that shows and hides the system UI (i.e.
    WeekFilterGlucose
    The PagerAdapter that will provide fragments for each of the sections.
    WelcomeActivity
    Intro slider where user can swipe through few slides showing the major features of the app before getting into.
